content: this is a wig in the style of hallowig 1 and flick 2 but this has a side part instead of straight across bangs i am a very loose knitter so i use size 6 needles on worsted yarn your gauge might be very different luckily this is all in ribbing so it is very forgiving 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/hallowig 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/flick-knitted-hat-wig-fun-chemo-cap
